content.rendered:
• Home
  • Company Registration

Company Registration

Company Registration Services in Bangalore

Private Limited Company is necessary for the people to give their business a face lift as constitution where all business owners can become directors in the company and invest money by purchasing of shares. We are the best Company Registration Consultants in Bangalore. We take care company registration process with very easy procedure and user friendly technology. All these services are available at your doorstep.

Documents required:

  • PAN Card of all directors,
  • ID and address proof of all directors
  • Photos
  • Business address.

 

Time Duration:
30 working days.

Our Methodology
  • Getting DIN of all directors
  • Digital Signature of any one director
  • Apply for name allotment
  • Preparation of MOA & AOA
  • Uploading of documents like MOA, AOA, Form-1, Form-18, Form-32
  • Getting name allotment letter from MCA
  • Obtaining certificate of incorporation from MCA

Quick Links

  • GST consultants in Bangalore
  • Income Tax
  • Book Keeping Services
  • Company Registration
  • Shop and Establishment
  • PAN Card
  • Partnership Registration
  • Import & Export
  • Loan Property Consultants
  • Service Tax
  • TDS for NRIs
  • Form 26QB

Get in touch

Gururaj Associates has been established since 2001, with a vision of reaching Income Tax Services to the people who are in small and medium sector.

Contact Us
